## Normalize the path:

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) 
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir=normalizePath('../../')) 
```

### read in data

```{r}
library(data.table)
met <- fread("largedata/metabolite.txt", sep = "\t",header = T)
mets = fread("data/supplementary/Supplemental_Table_S1.csv", sep = ",",header = T)
overlap = fread("largedata/overlap_met.txt", sep = "\t", header = F)
overlap$id = as.integer(gsub("M-","",overlap$V1))
c = cbind(met[overlap$id,], mets[overlap$V2,])
meto = fread("largedata/metos.txt", sep = "\t",header = T)
meto$`Metabolite ID` = gsub("m/z", "",meto$`Metabolite ID`)
meto$mass = as.numeric(gsub(".*_","",meto$`Metabolite ID`))

```
